---

<div>

</div>

**Type**: TSInterface

|PROPERTY|TYPE|DESCRIPTION|
|:---:|:---:|:---:|
|hitTest|number|<p>size ratio to find items. (default: 1) </p>|
|sibling|number|<p>The number of items next to the item's index to return. (default: 0) </p>|
|align|"start" \| "end" \| "center"|<p>Where to arrange the items in the container. (default: &quot;start&quot;) </p>|
|excludeStand|boolean|<p>Whether to find the next item except sorting it in place. (default: false) </p>|
|offset|number|<p>The value to scroll further from the sort position. (default: 0) </p>|
|duration|number|<p>How long to scroll animation time. (default: 0) </p>|
